content: materials - 1 skein of purl soho s mulberry merino 1 80% extra fine merino wool and 20% mulberry silk each skein is 247 yards/ 100 grams approximately 150 yards required we used the color heirloom white - a set of us 4 3 5 mm double pointed needles 3 - a cable stitch holder 4 gauge 28 stitches and 36 row = 4 inches in stockinette stitch size - finished circumference 6 inches unstretched comfortably stretching to fit most adults - finished length 7 ¾ inches with enough yarn to make each hand warmer at least 2 inches longer 1 https //www purlsoho com/mulberry-merino 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=969 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=888 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools/notions html collection_filter=964
